title: Mokka Manusha Lyrics Kalakalappu Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Mokka manusha
Singers: Steevevatz & Suchithra Karthik

Movie: Kalakalappu @ Masala Cafe
Music: Vijay Ebenezer
Lyricist: Pa.Vijay

Dear sagalai's and ragalai's
Address-eh illaama advice pannuvor sangam
kattina paatu ithu

Come-on come-on come-on come-on
Gopaalu meiyaalu
appaalu thabbaalu ..ohh..

Mokka manusha..nee oppuku chappa
hey lambaa lambaa..ne makka makka (2)

oh... follow me
Repeat-u..apeatu.. delete-u..repeatu..
reveetu..apeatu ..delete..repeat..

life eh masala ensaai da saala
life eh masala ensaai da saala (2)

Mokka manusha..nee oppuku chappa
hey lambaa lambaa..ne makka makka

Sugar illaa gulaab jamoon kupaiyinile
Figure illaa bus ellam pickup illae
Aaku phoku aatam illaa ragalai illai
hey ajili gujili asku busuku avasthe ille
yo yo yo yo yo
life eh masala ensaai da saala(2)

Vaazhkai na see-saw
thirimbidichu lesa
ipothu namma timeh dhan raasa

Mokka manusha..nee oppuku chappa
hey lambaa lambaa..ne makka makka
hey..mokka manusha..un luck la thappa
hey eppa eppa..ne kaali dappa

lets go
Kaasu iruntha call taxi thola
paisa illana kaaleh taxi thola
naalu roadula nikkuthada life
ode odathaan ennaikume sirappu

Vaazhkai na see-saw
thirimbidichu lesa
ipothu namma timeh dhan raasa

Mokka manusha..nee oppuku chappa
hey lambaa lambaa..ne makka makka
hey..mokka manusha..un luck la thappa
hey eppa eppa..ne kaali dappa

Omlet rotti evening la special tea
ithu kooda illati..so what lets party
one side pondatti, one side vapaatti
balance pannaa avan dhan killaadi

Kozhi kaal soup vachan
aatu kaal soup vachan
missed call soup vaipaana

Naai vaalu valanjirukkum
poona vaalu valanjirukkum
Compound vaalu valanjirukkuma?Â  ma maa

Mokka manusha..nee oppuku chappa
hey lambaa lambaa..ne makka makka (2)

oh... follow me
Repeat-u..apeatu.. delete-u..repeatu..
reveetu..apeatu ..delete..repeat..

life eh masala ensaai da saala
life eh masala ensaai da saala (2)

mokka manusha..saala
nee oppuku chappa..saala
hey lambaa lambaa..saala

life eh masala ensaai da saala
